headline: Old Dominion Freight Line (ODFL) Sees 10% Stock Drop Over Last Quarter
summary: Old Dominion Freight Line (ODFL) reported disappointing second-quarter earnings, with sales and net income both declining compared to the previous year. Despite affirmative news about a 7.7% dividend increase and share repurchase activity, ODFL saw its stock fall by 10.23% over the past quarter. This decline mirrored broader market concerns, as stocks generally fell due to weak job reports and renewed tariff worries. Old Dominion's on-market total return decline may have been amplified by...
